blogs.title: Jo beet gayi so baat gayi
blogs.body:
let it go

There was a star in life,
it means that he was very dear,
he drowned, then he drowned,
look at Amber's joy,
how many of his stars were broken,
how many of his loved ones were left,
those who were left, then where did they meet , but tell me , when does Amber mourn
for the broken stars , that is gone. Went


In life, he was a safflower,
you always showered on it,
when it dried up, it dried up,
look at Madhuvan's chest,
how dry its buds
withered, how many flowers
that withered, where did they bloom again, but tell me , when Madhuvan makes noise
on dry flowers, what has passed is gone.


In life there was a cup of honey,
you had given your body and mind to it,
when it broke, it broke down
in the courtyard of the tavern, see
how many cups get shaken,
fall and get mixed with the soil,
when they get up when they fall,
but tell me
when the tavern regrets
the past gone is gone

They are made of soft clay, they keep
breaking the honey pots, they
have brought a short life, they
keep breaking the cups,
yet there
is a shortage of honey in the taverns, the honey cups,
those who are intoxicated,
they keep looting the honey,
he is a raw drinker.
Whose love is on cups,
who burns with true honey,
when does he cry, shouts,
what has passed is gone.
blogs.author: Harivansh Rai Bachchan
